title: [Maaghara Tower]
description: Crafted of polished oak planks, the ledge is both wide and long, spanning the front of a huge oak tree.  The bark covering the colossus is rough and as black as coal.  Overhead, contorted branches as thick as a mammoth jut out in all directions, blocking out all direct sunlight.

Crafted of polished oak planks, the ledge is both wide and long, spanning the front of a huge oak tree.  The bark covering the colossus is rough and as black as coal.  Overhead, contorted branches as thick as a mammoth jut out in all directions, obscuring the light of the moon.
